description: Establish the foundational architecture for the motion planning system, including integration with sensor fusion, perception, and control modules.
Develop and integrate the A* algorithm for global path planning in urban road networks.
Enhance the global path planning by implementing a Dijkstra-based optimization algorithm for minimizing travel distance and time.
Implement RRT for generating feasible paths in dynamic and constrained urban environments.

task: Develop Probabilistic Roadmap (PRM) for Local Path Planning
description: Incorporate PRM to enhance local path planning and maneuvering in cluttered areas.

task: Implement Kalman Filter for Dynamic Obstacle Tracking
description: Develop a Kalman Filter-based module to predict the movement of dynamic obstacles such as vehicles and pedestrians.

task: Integrate Model Predictive Control (MPC) for Trajectory Generation
description: Implement MPC to ensure smooth and optimized trajectory generation while maintaining safety constraints.
Develop algorithms to ensure the vehicle adheres to urban traffic rules, including speed limits, stop signs, and traffic lights.

task: Implement Behavioral Cloning Using Deep Neural Networks
description: Train and integrate a behavioral cloning model to replicate human driving behavior in urban environments.
Design a heuristic approach to execute safe and efficient lane changes based on traffic flow.

task: Optimize Trajectory Using Gradient Descent Methods
description: Incorporate gradient descent optimization for real-time trajectory smoothing and energy efficiency.

task: Test and Validate Using CARLA Simulator
description: Use the CARLA simulator to test and validate the performance of motion planning algorithms in diverse urban scenarios.
Develop a real-time emergency braking system using sensor fusion data and motion prediction.
Combine particle filter algorithms with HD map data to achieve precise localization in urban areas.

task: Develop Multi-Objective Optimization for Urban Driving
description: Implement algorithms to balance competing objectives such as safety, efficiency, and passenger comfort in trajectory planning.

task: Conduct Multi-Agent Testing for Intersection Scenarios
description: Simulate and test intersection scenarios involving multiple autonomous and human-driven vehicles.
Develop CACC algorithms to enable safe and efficient coordination with other vehicles in urban traffic.

task: Create ROS Nodes for Modular Motion Planning Components
description: Develop ROS nodes for individual components such as path planning, trajectory generation, and decision-making for seamless integration.
Design and execute OpenScenario-based tests to validate safety and reliability of motion planning algorithms.
Prepare comprehensive documentation for all motion planning algorithms, including design considerations and implementation details.
